attributes.action: Re- nationalise the utilities and railways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We urge the PM and his government to re-nationalise the utilities i.e. gas, electric water and the railways and take them out of private control. The way prices are rising and the need to placate share holders is making it nigh impossible for the poor and the elderly to afford them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
